website_summaries.verdict: Despite some scent inconsistencies, it has gained many satisfied customers for its exceptional, cruelty-free formula.
pros: A natural, pure, therapeutic-grade formula harvested from Australia, an area of the world known for the best quality tea tree oil
Doesn't contain artificial ingredients, isn't tested on animals
cons: A few gripes of bottles that leaked during delivery
Scent gets some mixed reviews – some say it's too light, strong, or has a chemical smell, while others praise it

customer_reviews.title: Good oil
customer_reviews.text: It smells good to me. I have no complaints. I use this in a foot soak for my father, he lost his eyesight and I cut his toenails for him. I really want to remind people that Tea Tree oil is not good for dogs and cats or any small animal. Its also not good to allow them to breath it in. I see someone answered a question that its ok to use on dogs. No it is not so please be careful. Dogs have gotten sick from inhaling it. Aside from that, I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DMC

customer_reviews.title: Bummed. I miss the old formula & boxing.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for a second time and am in shock with how much different the smell is - it’s disgusting!! The bottle is different, there’s no extra sample scents... I don’t understand why this is different the second order around
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Dell

customer_reviews.title: My face and lips were severely burned.
customer_reviews.text: When I had first got it in the bubble mailer it spelt like chemicals before I had even cut the package open, then when I opened the box containing the 'tea tree oil' I got a horrible migraine, but I had still tried to use it mixed in with my moisturizer once and absolutely never again. I got severe burns on my face and my lips are chapped and bleeding, which really sucks because I had just got my skin to where I wanted it to be and I thought the oil would just help improve it :(. So please. Do not purchase this product unless you're looking to completely dry out and burn your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Stover

customer_reviews.title: Smells awful.  Like rotten cabbage and rubber inner tube.
customer_reviews.text: I put some in my conditioner and it smelled so bad. I used it and my hair smells. My bathroom smelled bad for hours. BEWARE YOU CAN'T RETURN THIS OIL. Amazon says it requires special handling that they can't provide. It came UPS ground in a regular box. This is the first problem I've had with Amazon. Truly disappointed. Learn from my mistake and don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible imitation of tea tree oil
customer_reviews.text: Horrible imitation of tea tree oil. As one reviewer stated here, this does not have the natural earthy smell of tea tree oil but rather one of chemicals reminiscent of pine-sol. They also sent two small sample bottles of essential oils that when I tried in the bath made my skin burn. Can't believe amazon had this is one of their deals of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fine quality. It’s tea tree oil-so people who complain about the smell(gasoline or whatever)obviously aren’t familiar with tea tree oil. It doesn’t smell like a chemical or gasoline. It smells like teal tree oil. I use on my skin for a pop up blemish and luckily it’s gone over night. It can dry out your skin, so just moisturize and you are fine. Also, keep away from skin around eye-but that is common knowledge, right?
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: I smell paint thinner
customer_reviews.text: Terrible smell!!!! It smelled something like paint thinner. It is terrible. I used my teeth, like an idiot, to open the wrapper around the lid and my tongue went numb. Just say it in the box on my kitchen counter and walked away. Came back 5 minutes later and the kitchen smelled as if someone just striped the paint off of my walls. I’m afraid to use this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: heather Lukas

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality oil...
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality product...I use some in the washing machine and in my dishwasher (along with natural laundry soap and dishwashing detergent). Fast facts about tea tree oil- ~Tea tree oil is distilled from the leaves of the Melaleuca alternifolia plant, found in Australia. The oil possesses antibacterial, anti-inflammatory, antiviral, and antifungal properties. ~A person can treat acne, athlete's foot, contact dermatitis or head lice using tea tree oil. ~Tea tree oil should never be swallowed. It’s uses are far and wide...but just like any medicine- naturally occurring or not- make sure you know what dosage to use for whatever you’re using it for. 😊
customer_reviews.author: GypsyJoujougurl

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in the 4 oz bottle:
customer_reviews.text: The package was delivered smelling strongly of tee trea oil. When opened, there was oil all over the bottle. When I opened the bottle itself, it smelled really off. I have used many tee tree oils, with various different brands, and many different tea tree oil products over the years so I know what to expect with the scent. This bottle was either old, or had been mixed with another substance. I threw it away.
customer_reviews.author: HayleyLH

customer_reviews.title: Smells awful
customer_reviews.text: I use it to treat my nails. I have had other varieties before that smells strong but not awful. Would not buy this brand ever again. It says 100% but I think the bad smell must be a carrier oil. I love the dropper, but if it isn't actually effective, ease of application won't matter. Can't return it. Debating what to do - will definitely go back to the brand I used last time.
customer_reviews.author: tobreth

customer_reviews.title: Smell is a little off
customer_reviews.text: As some other reviews have mentioned the smell of this tea tree oil is not quite right. I've used a variety of brands over the years including some that had an absolutely terrible pine sol like smell. This one almost smells like it is supposed to, but something is a little off. Some other reviews mentioned a smell like tires, and I'd have to agree. The tire smell is subtle to me, and not so bad that I won't use it, but I'll look for another brand next time. It's too bad, because the price was very good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This really works.. I am not a paid person to say this :)
customer_reviews.text: I have had a boil for years in my armpit, that antibiotics never helped with. It has been lanced by doctors countless times, and always returned. I admit, i have been only using this product for a week, but omg! my armpit is like.. healing.. the cool feeling the oil leaves on your skin is great in itself, but it also seems to be calming and shrinking the boil.. much better than the bottle of antibiotics in the background in the picture! I am throwing them out. I will probably hate myself in the morning, for sharing my boil issues publicly on Amazon, but this is working so well, I had to say something.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Mullin

customer_reviews.title: Chemical or paint thinner? Causes rashes and burns.
customer_reviews.text: I have used Tea tree oil for years, so I know what it should smell like. This product does not smell right. This has a tiny hint of tea tree oil smell, but it is mostly covered by a chemical paint thinner smell. I should have known better, but I still used it. It gave me a terrible rash that was basically a chemical burn. I forgot that I had also added it to a mixture that i was going to apply to my skin. When I applied it it also gave me a rash/burn. So I know it was this product.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Water NOT aloe gel.
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS FAKE. Safty seal had been removed and placed bak on not even glued. Obvious that a good percentage of water was added. TASTED LIKE WATER WITH A LITTLE LEMON JUICE. NO ALOE, NONE AT ALL... and it WAS NOT GEL. In addition, it took forever to be delivered. Probably because the batches were getting watered down. No wonder there is no return. BIG disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Massact

customer_reviews.title: Large bottle great price
customer_reviews.text: I’m not super into EO but bought this to treat spots of psoriasis that I occasionally have. Is also great for any skin fungus such as athlete’s foot. Important to read enclosed info prior to using. I have used the YL oils and, honestly, find this one to be just as good for my needs. I can’t speak about other uses such as diffuser or ingestion. I am very happy with this large bottle I got for a good price. I also received a complimentary small EO called Zen for relaxation.
customer_reviews.author: LBP

customer_reviews.title: Did it work on my nail fungus?
customer_reviews.text: Hey. I tried it on what appeared to be nail fungus, on the recommendation of my doctor. And it worked. I had been fighting with this white raised nail for a year with little or no success. Tried this, and it went away in about 3-4 months. I hesitate to make definite claims about this, but I’m happy.
customer_reviews.author: Sue E

customer_reviews.title: Can’t apply without mixing...
customer_reviews.text: Don’t like how this has to be mixed with another oil to use on skin or nails... other than that seems to work
customer_reviews.author: David T. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Horrible, smells like a dead animal
customer_reviews.text: stinks and does not work. could not return, buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: KIMBER BLACK

customer_reviews.title: Tea tree oil you can count on
customer_reviews.text: Doterra essential oils are my typical go to for all things essential, but I needed a faster delivery and opted for Amazon. I was extremely pleased with Artnaturals tea tree oil and will definitely try their other oils. It blended well into my DIY facial products and did the job removing the wax paper from my bulk fabric orders without leaving a strong smell. Definitely a value at its price. Thank you Amazon for your delivery service. It's always right on time.
customer_reviews.author: Randee Grant

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I tried many products for a dryness that I had had for years in the palm of my hand honesty, nothing worked.I read where the authentic tea tree oil can remedy fungal and bacterial problems so I tried this one. Happily after about two weeks I can see the hand is starting to heal there is no itching or burning with this product it is great. I use it just before bedtime. I would buy this again and strongly recommend it to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: D. De Souza

customer_reviews.title: # 1 for price and quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very high quality tea tree oil compare to the ones that I used in the past. I have tried many and this one beats them all by a long shot . The smell is amazing , I use it to clean my house and use orally and topically. Basically tea tree has the versatility of a pair of black leggings. I would definitely recommend this tea tree oil to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Abigale Hutchings

customer_reviews.title: BE AWARE...
customer_reviews.text: Too watery, not effective! And I can not return it. The web info is wrong, and does not say it isn't refundable!
customer_reviews.author: chikitabailar

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about this one....
customer_reviews.text: The first time I purchased the oil was wonderful and it had a nice pleasant scent. I could also feel a little tingling sensation when I placed them on my scars. The bottle lasted me for almost 3 months using twice daily. The second time I purchased, whoa!!! It smells like manure, mold and something else mixed together. I have to hold my breath to put it on and I absolutely cannot put it on in the morning. I also barely feel a tingling sensation. It smells so bad I am deeply considering tossing it but I just opened the bottle 3 days ago.
customer_reviews.author: T. Macon

customer_reviews.title: Same consistency, aroma, and therapeutic qualities as its more expensive store counterparts
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with this product. It arrived just as shown, and in my opinion is very high quality! I was very concerned about the quality because of the price. I was accustomed to paying significantly more for the same oil in local health food stores, but when I received the oil it had the same consistency, aroma, and therapeutic qualities as its more expensive store counterparts. I have used this oil in several of my diy natural products (ie. Toothpaste, cleaning supplies) as well as in my essential oil diffusers and by its self directly on my skin. I will diffidently buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Rhine

customer_reviews.title: Weird product.....
customer_reviews.text: I'm very familiar with tea tree oil. Usually buy the NOE brand, because their product smells closer to real tea tree oil, from my pov. Art Naturals does have a weird, motor oil type of smell when u smell it straight out the bottle, but once I rub it on my skin, it starts to smell like traditional tea tree oil. I mainly use this product on my face. I mix it with aftershave to prevent bumps and infections. I only bought this brand cause it was on sale. If everything goes good, I'll buy again. But the unauthentic smell has me concerned...
customer_reviews.author: SLT

customer_reviews.title: Real tea tree oil is a must in my house.
customer_reviews.text: Tea tree oil is a staple in my home. And it's hard to find a real and pure brand. This seems pretty pure. It does so many things. Just to name a few it kills toenail fungus, it kills rashes, and it can reopen pores on your scalp and make your hair grow thicker, it's great for Eczema. It kills germs.
customer_reviews.author: Carol C.

customer_reviews.title: Great price for the quantity & quality!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so that I could make a spray for my children's hair. With both of them in elementary school, I wanted to try to keep lice away as much as possible as I never want to have to endure the hell that lice produce again. I don't think I needed nearly as big a bottle as this but I definitely think this was a great price for this much! I diluted it with water in a glass spray bottle and mist it onto their hair in the morning before school. I have also used it in some of my diffusers. Definitely high quality.
customer_reviews.author: MCS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Oil
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several other tea tree oils, and this is the best. 1) The 4 oz jar lasts a long time 2) It has a pleasant, strong scent but is not too overpowering. 3) The dropper/syringe is much more convenient than a shaker 4) It serves multiple purposes: I mix with aloe for soothing skin irritation, especially after shaving, mix with conditioner for a more effective hair mask, add a few drops to my bath for relaxation, and use it in my diffuser to freshen the air.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi R

customer_reviews.title: Dazzling Tea tree Conditioner
customer_reviews.text: I've always heard that tea tree oil is one of Australia’s almost mythical conditioners. This was my first time trying it out. I mainly bought it for my hair even though it’s used for a range of purposes, including skincare and hair conditioner. I like it, It’s like a "health boost" for your scalp. The smell is a little too strong but it doesn't bother me.
customer_reviews.author: Trading Robot

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after my new piercing started developing a keloid. It did help but be aware it dries your skin out super bad. I've been picking huge flakes of skin off my ear for days now. The dropper it came with is a little wonky and doesnt pick up a lot of product so I wouldnt say it works properly but it is definitely not important enough to warrant a bad review. Overall.. good product.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: This is the real deal
customer_reviews.text: I was worried this product might be a fake tea tree oil, like other essential oils I've ordered from Amazon. It turns out this oil is definitely real tea tree, and it works wonders! I already used it to cure my daughter's athlete foot by mixing a few drops into foot lotion and massaging on each morning. I'm also mixing a couple drops into my Cetaphil face wash each night and all my blackheads dissolve away! Leave you tingly, cool and refreshed. I love this product!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: HOLY MEDICINE
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for an itch that was driving me crazy on my scalp. The first day that it came, mixed it with canola oil, and on my hair it went. My itch on my scalp is a thing of the past. Just know that my soars were so bad that they used to bleed. My itchy scalp woke me up out my sleep. This is god sent.
customer_reviews.author: Bibiana Mancero

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT! Truly works like magic!
customer_reviews.text: Tea tree is by far the best natural antiseptic! I'm a True Believer in it's healing powers! It has worked on numerous issues from tow fungus to infections to blemishes. Absolutely love the dropper makes it nice and easy to not pour too much in your bath or whatever you use it for! Awesome product ! will buy again for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Berado

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the amount you get & the quality is good!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much says it all in the title, but I will say I have been using this and purchased it solely for trying to treat toenail fungus (thank you nail salon!)... now I have tried many thing sin the past including tea tree oil and just gave up because I was not really seeing any result. I will say I am still using this one because I am seeing results & for the first time I am hopeful that I will be able to have "normal toenails" again if I stick with this long enough.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Kinda gross story but... I had an abscess right under my skin with no head/opening so I could not drain it. It hurt too much to try to pop. I put a cotton pad with a few drops of this tea tree oil in it and just chilled out for maybe 30 min. By morning it was draining and popped on it’s own. This bottle has lasted me 4 months and I used it everyday during my face cleaning routine. I love it and will be buying another bottle. Tried another brand and it was not as strong definitely staying with this one
customer_reviews.author: dynasty norris

customer_reviews.title: 100% pure at a blend price
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy a 4 ounce bottle - the word "fragrance" is not one I want in my home, and it seemed too good to be true. However, that was not the case. This is 100% pure essential oil with a strong scent. I use TT for a multitude of purposes, so the larger size is must-have. And it comes with a dropper lid as well as screw top. I will definitely be buying from artnaturals again!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal G

customer_reviews.title: Use very little at a time
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my diff-user. It takes just a few drops &leaves a good refreshing smell in the room. Got to get more diff users O I can have this smell over more of the house. Something about it I've heard kills mold & fungus, , & you never know what's growing where..Whether in the shower or tub, or maybe down the drain where you can't see. OR it helps with a stopped up nose too!
customer_reviews.author: dotntn

customer_reviews.title: Damn Mosquitos
customer_reviews.text: I bought this primarily for mosquito bites. Put it on, next day forms a blister, wash it off, next day, it's gone. I , also, noticed I was getting ants along one of the baseboards in my house. (country living) Mixed a couple drops with water, sprayed it on the infested parts...no more ants. This stuff does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Tim -Illinois

customer_reviews.title: Love this product.
customer_reviews.text: You can literally add a few drops to a wide range of products. I use it primarily in my shampoo. I can spend $30 to get tea tree oil shampoo, or I can turn ordinary shampoo into tea-tree oil infused shampoo. :) I originally purchased it so a friend could use it to kill bed bugs. This was a recommended use by several websites, and it did the trick for my friend.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Platt, author of 'Advanced Book Marketing for Starving Authors'

customer_reviews.title: I loveee the smell
customer_reviews.text: I previously purchased an ArtNaturals essential oil pack that came with 8 oils and I absolutely loved them. I use them in my aromatherapy diffuser. The Tea Tree oil was my favorite so I purchased this large bottle. The first thing I noticed was how carefully it was packed. Also, two extra oils were included with my order and I thought that was very kind and generous! I will be back for more!!!
customer_reviews.author: Wells FamilyTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Lice repellent /killer
customer_reviews.text: Second time purchasing this product use for linens and body... Works cor luce fungus and bug repel MOMS GET THIS! after a previous lice epidemic we tried tea tree and critters died instantly it attacks there nervous system and voila all gone... I use tea tree water in spray bottle and use it on daughters hair when im putting her hair up. Thank you Jesus for this product
customer_reviews.author: Christina B

customer_reviews.title: Such a deal!
customer_reviews.text: I'm thrilled. I bust through tea tree oil, rubbing it on my scalp every few days. I've paid $10 for a .5 - ounce bottle, whereas this one is $17 for a 4 - oz. bottle -- 8 times the quantity! So far it's great. Smells nice, seems to be of the same quality as other brands. It comes with a medicine dropper, which makes it easy to control the amount of product dispensed. And the big bottle is a lot harder to tip over than those teeny ones.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Bernstein

customer_reviews.title: tea tree oil
customer_reviews.text: This tea tree oil is an excellent purchase. I put some drops this into my baths, shampoo bottle , after couple weeks, This work very effectively for my skin, my skin is clearing up very well. I also use it for my acnes too, I smeared a little on the acnes before I sleep, my acnes is gone only 2~3 days. I love this tea tree oil. But yes, the smell is a little bit strong for me
customer_reviews.author: ming

customer_reviews.title: Great product poor packaging!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, 100% tea tree oil! However the dropper dispenser which is glass was broken upon arrival. I presume it broke somewhere in the factory or warehouse because I was not able to locate all the pieces of the broken glass dropper. Note to ArtNaturals - How about you seal the bottle with the dropper “inside the bottle” and enclose the plastic cap as a secondary method of capping the bottle and NOT vice versa! Common sense. I’d like to upload pics but Amazon not giving me the option.
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: Total Garbage. Poor quality oil with bad smell.
customer_reviews.text: My purchase a while ago was decent. Now the product is very different. Terrible smell and doesn't work the same way. Likely sourced from dubious sources or poor quality control or both. You can never get through to customer service if you call the company (can't even leave a message - mailbox full) and the product on Amazon is NON RETURNABLE so essentially have to write it off. Don't waste your time and look elsewhere. (I rarely write reviews but this was so bad that it motivated me to help others avoid the same fate as I benefit from their reviews).
customer_reviews.author: sk

customer_reviews.title: Works like magic!
customer_reviews.text: Great tea tree oil! It quickly gets rid of my daughters acne. My son sometimes gets cold sores and at the first tingle of one coming on, he applies the tea tree oil and it stops it from coming out. It really is fantastic. He used to spend so much money buying products that didn’t work. My house is never without a bottle of the tea tree oil
customer_reviews.author: Teri L

customer_reviews.title: Helps with asthma!
customer_reviews.text: Art Naturals scents are much cheaper than other essential oil brands and come in large 4oz bottles. It comes with a dropper so it’s easy to put in your diffuser. I purchased Eucalyptus, Lemongrass, And Tea Tree Oil. Eucalyptus and Lemongrass smell fantastic and the scent lasts for hours after the diffuser stops. The Tea Tree Oil scent smells odd and isn’t for me. My girlfriend has asthma that acts up at night but when I put the diffuser on with these scents she immediately stops coughing! Definitely recommend if you or someone you live with has asthma.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Not pure?
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this tea tree oil because I liked the dropper type bottle. I use tea tree oil very often and have for many years. I would say that this brand doesn't smell as strong and does not seem to work as well as other "pure" tea tree oils have. I am a little disappointed and have doubts about this being pure tea tree oil. I use tea tree for spider repellant and a disinfectant in skin care.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Regretting this purchase - not really tea tree oil
customer_reviews.text: After opening this product it was blatantly obvious that this is not real tea tree oil. The smell is WAY off, i put it directly on my skin without a carrier oil and my REAL tea tree oil would burn if I did that. This is very obviously not real tea tree oil! The consistency isn't right either. I guess I should have known better than to order an essential oil that is this cheap - RED FLAG! And now I can't even return in! DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: jenn

customer_reviews.title: Art Naturals Tea Tree Essential Oil - Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Art Naturals Tea Tree Essential Oil and it's amazing. The fungus has started to disappear after only 11 days of use. I can see it disappearing and I'll be surprised if I'll need another bottle. I will be reordering because I want to have it on hand. This is my first fungus and hopefully my last!
customer_reviews.author: J. Jurist

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought several oils from this company and they’re all great, however this is my favorite, I use it for itchy skin, bug bites, athletes foot. Recently I was vacationing in Puerto Rico and got bit all over my limbs by Jejen which I’m very sensitive to. This oil helped with the itch and diminished the swelling, healing the bites much faster than anything else. I just got a second bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great for acne!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this one. I recently started using organic oil for my skin care. I have problems with acne (not severe, I deal with acnes once a month before period). By applying this oil after applying cream, it really helped ease the acnes and I see a drastic improvement the next morning. I also use this to mix a little bit with shampoo and the cooling sensation feels amazing on my scalp and my dandruff (mild symptom) improved.
customer_reviews.author: Eunice

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have rosacea and slight acne on my cheeks and nose and I’ve been using this tea tree oil to help reduce both (mixed with raw honey). I definitely see a difference in my skin: less red and breakouts have been going down. Also, the product was packaged really well and even came with two samples of different essential oils, which smell amazing. I definitely recommend this seller! The tea tree oil is an acquired smell. I don’t personally enjoy it but it’s worth it for the results. Try it out
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: do not buy this
customer_reviews.text: way too potent! burned my skin. i should have thrown it away but i put it in my cabinet...now a few months later and the top of the bottle actually MELTED all over my medicine cabinet. i grabbed the bottle and the rubber mess got all over my brand new $35.00 manicure and total ruined it.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I got this two days ago. I planned to use it on my new rook piercing but then I learned all the other great uses for tea tree oil. I've mixed it into my moisturizer to try to rid some of my pesky acne scars. Just applying this to my face gives a smoother look to my complexion. It also doesn't feel oily for those who may be worried about that. It feels like I only used my moisturizer (but it smells much better). I also love the two little complementary bottles of essential oils they give you as well. I honestly have no clue how to use them, but they smell great!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Labeling and quality changed....No longer good quality oils! Time to find a new brand of oils!
customer_reviews.text: Not happy, likely returning. This is Not the same tea tree formula I previously purchased from ArtNaturals. They changed their labeling, but I didn’t take that to mean they changed their product. I also ordered their Lavender, which is also of poor quality compared to their previous oil. My son liked their sweet orange, which I also thought smelled nice. I guess it’s time to find a new brand of essential oils....both the lavender and tea tree will be returned
customer_reviews.author: ChristyS

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome value. You get quite a bit of volume for a pretty decent price. I used this on a keloid that developed on my nose and it went away in a week. It also helps with acne. I’ve seen an overall improvement in blemishes. I find scent to be very nice and soothing. Wouldn’t recommend using this on sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Love this brand!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this brand!! Definitely going to stock up on these essential oils because you get a lot for your money!! The lemon smell is so nice!! Preparing for the sick season since we have already had colds! Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Momma

customer_reviews.title: A potent therapeutic grade oil
customer_reviews.text: I like the ArtNaturals brand for Tea Tree oil, I have tried several. This has a true scent and is potent. I use it to make hand sanitizers, liquid soap, spray and in the aromatic diffuser, it give me a warm tingle. This is probably my favorite essential oil that goes a long way and is so versatile.
customer_reviews.author: CM King

customer_reviews.title: What changed?
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product again because I loved the last bottle that I purchased. I'm not sure if the formula changed with the packaging, BUT the smell isa HORRIBLE!!!!! Actually it's nauseating. It's nothing like it used to be ... even the oil it's thinner like water rather than oil. I found myself asking was this the real deal or an imitation?
customer_reviews.author: Dawn L.

customer_reviews.title: Big bottle! Great packaging!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed. I just received this today, no issues with delivery, you can tell the seller cares because they did a great job packing it for shipping. Strong scent we all know and love of tea tree oil. I add it to my shampoos and look forward to using it for a long time . It is a big bottle for a great price. Came with a dropped too! Will reorder again
customer_reviews.author: Cairo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased ArtNaturals products in the past, and this one is no different. Excellent quality, and I absolutely love the free samples that were included (Zen and Chi blends). The price for this 4-ounce bottle is the same that I'd pay at a drug store for a 1-ounce size. I'll be subscribing to it, as we use it for mosquito bites, add to dog shampoo, and cleaning. The dropper is handy too! Love the brand and the product.
customer_reviews.author: S. Bell

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for itschy scalp
customer_reviews.text: just mix a 3-5 drops of this oil in your regular shampoo. You can feel the difference after its use. Very strong scent though. Dont use it directly as it will burn your skin. Always mix it with a carrier oil or shampoo/conditioner. THe bottle will easily last 1-2 years
customer_reviews.author: PNW Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Best I've bought so far
customer_reviews.text: Comes with interchangeable glass pipette for way dispensing. You definitely can smell the tea tree oil. The last brand I bought didn't smell much at all. I use this to help with my ezcema and psoriasis (yes I have both...if one is not active the other is TT_TT). I mix a drop or two into my non scented for sensitive skin cleanser for my face and a couple drops more for my body. You can use it for spot treatment too if your skin is not super sensitive and watch out for drying out your skin
customer_reviews.author: lkimee

customer_reviews.title: The bottle and the smell changed
customer_reviews.text: The new bottle that I received looks different and smells different. I don't know if it's tea tree oil or not but it smells sour and diluted and is not as strong and fragrant. It smells nothing like the previous bottles I have received. I'm not sure if I should use it or not. There is also a no return policy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This absolutely works for rashes and itching.
customer_reviews.text: I was wondering if the reviews were true and they proved true to me. I purchased it for my itching rash that I couldn't get relief for months, and to my surprise, it took the itching away almost completely within 3 days of using this tea tree oil. It was really strong smelling for me but not too bad, so I mixed a few drops with organic coconut oil to cut the burning and smell, and it relieved my itching instantly with a cooling feeling. I love this oil. That area still itches once in a while but I'm certain that it will stop completely with a few more times of using it. Thank you! Finally something natural that works.
customer_reviews.author: M Carmen Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Many purposes
customer_reviews.text: I loved the tea tree oil since it can be used for many purposes. I mainly use it for bites to relief the itchiness and a tummy ache. I rub it on my tummy and it relieve the pain. I never knew about tea tree oil until I went to get my nose pierced and the man told me about it that it heals puncture wound which was true. I had my nose pierced a few times b4 and it always gets infected. This time it didn’t b/c I used tea tree like he said.
customer_reviews.author: Jaya

customer_reviews.title: Love the oils
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with the Tea Tree Oil plus bonus oils. I did not use the dropper and did not realize the little stopper would come out so easily, when I turned the bottle to get some oil on a cotton ball I spilled the oil. I use the oil as a disinfectant and also it works well to remove sticky glue or label backing that sticks to items.
customer_reviews.author: beachgirl

customer_reviews.title: Smell it BEFORE you buy!
customer_reviews.text: Smells like gasoline, very unpleasant. No returns because it’s liquid so you’ll be stuck with it. I like this brand, just not this particular scent.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Tried this because I read great things about it removing skin tags
customer_reviews.text: Tried this because I read great things about it removing skin tags. Totally worked!!!! I was amazed!!! I am still working on a really, really old mole - so I do not know how well it works with things that have been around awhile - but I had recently developed an ugly skin tag on my cheek and within 3 weeks it was gone. I do have a slight scar but it is slowly but surely healing and becoming hardly noticeable - and I will take that any day over a huge tag of odd looking skin!!! Seriously amazed at how well and how quick this worked!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sally Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Good price for the quantity.
customer_reviews.text: This size product was a great buy for the price. My daughter and I wanted to use this in homemade facial scrubs and other skin products. It is highly concentrated and does need a carrier. The scent is intense because of this. But we are happy with the product results thus far.
customer_reviews.author: judy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for skin care!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what I would do without this! I use it every day about 3-4 drops... I've bariely used 25% have I have had this bottle for about 2 years! I use it on my face every day and I used to have 2 little warts on my had and rubbing 2 drops morning and night my warts were completely gone within a month! I'm glad I tried natural remedies before I went to the dermatologist and spent all that money!
customer_reviews.author: Tech City Digital Solutions

customer_reviews.title: A good Product what recommending
customer_reviews.text: This tea tree oil is a very potent and effective treatment that works Well with acne Treatment and acne scars. I have been using tea tree oil for the last 4 years and have used versions brands. This brand has a genuine tea tree smell. Sometimes I use the oil directly but most of the time with coconut carrier oil. It works well for acne, the healing of minor cuts, abrasions and as a disinfectant. I will buy the product again and recommend it for others.
customer_reviews.author: Dozie

customer_reviews.title: It Stinks
customer_reviews.text: This smell of this oil is very pungent and off putting. The more I use it, the more I’m aware that this oil does not Have the fresh smell of a quality tea tree oil. It also lingers past any reasonable time frame. The Oil Was not delivered in the original packaging, and it didn’t have the glass dropper with it!!
customer_reviews.author: tj

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: NEVER apply directly to skin. Always use a wet cotton ball .. you only need about 2/3 drops added to the cotton ball. Trust me.
customer_reviews.author: Bri B

customer_reviews.title: Works as acne treatment!
customer_reviews.text: Like the smell, and how it works. After a month of use 2x day, my face looks better. Hope to get rid of it quick. I use tea tree oil and Vitamin C + E + Hyaluronic Acid. The acne dryes very quickly. Will write again after finishing the whole bottle.
customer_reviews.author: M&L OD

customer_reviews.title: Beware for hair!
customer_reviews.text: Something is off about this and I can’t figure out what it is, it even smells different than other tea tree oil I have used in the past. Do NOT use this in your hair, I mix some with shampoo and applied to my roots and it made my hair break off at he roots, I have hairs that are about an inch to 2-3 inches short now on top of my head and my hair reaches the bottom of my back! Beware for hair! I’ve just been using it topical on my skin and in a diffuser now.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Tea tree oil is a must-have in your medicine cabinet
customer_reviews.text: It’s tea tree oil so it smells like tea tree oil. This stuff is the best for bug bites - mosquito and fire ant bites, especially. One of my dogs gets an allergic reaction to something in the yard so I put a few drops in her bath and it takes away the itch. Good stuff! Lots of uses. The dropper makes it easy to dispense as well.
customer_reviews.author: Heather G

customer_reviews.title: Great for my Hair
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It is not heavy and oily, the scent is a bit strong, but it does keep my hair from falling out so quickly. I have been using this product for years. It also controls itching. A great product.
customer_reviews.author: Babin

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fact that it came with a dropper. Very easy to use. Appears to be full strength and pure. I’ve added it to my shampoo to relieve itching. I mix with water to make a spray for mattresses to mitigate mites.
customer_reviews.author: spartangmom

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time purchasing tea tree oil and I def recommend buying it from ArtNaturals. The bottle came nicely package without any damages. I applied it everyday for 3 weeks and I was afraid that I was going to run out, but I am happy to say that I have more than half of the bottle left! Most likely thanks to the nifty glass dropper. This is def a high concentration of tea tree oil, which is great for health purposes, but be prepared for the smell. So all-in-all I am glad I bought this one online instead of stopping by Trader Joe's like I originally intended.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Sou

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what the difference is but Tea Tree oil aroma usually gives me a headache but this really smells good. Also I can tell its not adulterated and good quality. Sometimes companies offer free product for a review but this is my own opinion and I did not receive anything free. Actually I bought a second bottle on my own at full price. I put in a few drop on my face sponge and I noticed a difference in my breakouts. I would not used too much though cause like I said it seems pretty pure and burns if you use too much.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Bundy

customer_reviews.title: Good to have around
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to help with skin tags, but was not consistent enough to eliminate it completely. I did have noticeable results and it is nice to have it around. I did have it in a cupboard in my kitchen and every time you would open it, it was all you could smell. So just be careful where you store it!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie H.

customer_reviews.title: Quality product for great price
customer_reviews.text: I love the glass dropper included in the lid - so convenient for adding to lotions or shampoos. The smell is more pleasant than tea tree oils from other brands I’ve used too. I use primarily as a toner after washing my face (diluted), and I love it. Great for keeping your skin blemish free! Highly recommend this brand.
customer_reviews.author: KEskra

customer_reviews.title: The real deal....Use caution as tea tree oil of any brand is harmful for dogs.
customer_reviews.text: This is outstanding stuff. We added it to shampoo/conditioner when our children had head lice and it worked well to prevent them from reappearing. We've only used it for lice and we've only had one case of lice in our lives...ever. USE EXTREME CAUTION if you use tea tree oil and you have pets as this product is harmful to dogs.
customer_reviews.author: PiTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: helped solve nail fungus and athlete's foot problem
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product - helped with athletes foot fungus on my big toe and after three weeks the infection cleared up. Guess the tea tree oil does the job. It also helps with foot odor issues also. I also used Art Natural's tree Oil antifungal soap Essential Oil which I am sure also helped. Product arrived in a timely manner and its a decent price. Art Naturals provides a great product and good service. Comes with a large eyedropper application instrument.
customer_reviews.author: JOT

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, works as advertised, As Good As Or Better Than Other Products.
customer_reviews.text: I use this with witch hazel toner to clean my face each day. Keeps my face clear and moisturized during the spring and summer training season. Smells good and does as advertised, this is good for oily, dry/oily combo faces. 7 drops on a cotton ball and a couple of squirts of witch hazel toner and you are good to go. A drop of peppermint oil to wake up the skin also works. Just keep it away from your eyes. I paid full price for this by the way.
customer_reviews.author: JWill

customer_reviews.title: Not like the first bottle
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd purchase of this product, I really liked my first purchase. This one on the other hand looked like it might have spilled in the box but I honestly couldn't tell because it still looked secured but there was a stain and smell. Thinking that it could have been from another box maybe broke and spilled on the others I didn't return it. Big mistake, this one smells foul and rancid.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonianTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: and it works great. Don't use on open wound or popped pimple ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this to reduce redness on my face from acne, and it works great. Don't use on open wound or popped pimple as it will sting. It's a strong aroma and it takes time to get used to. Only issue I have with this is the dropper was shipped broken and it doesn't work as good, which I'm sure is just a defect, on my bottle. I still give it 5 stars because it works great for me, regardless of the dropper situation.
customer_reviews.author: Jisel

customer_reviews.title: Multi purpose
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product intended to help with mild yet stubborn acne induced by stress & hormones. I had tried everything recommended to me and nothing worked. I’ve been applying this on the specific trouble area and it’s helped reduce break outs and has helped improve pigmentation. I also drop a few drops of oil in my regular shampoo to help repel head lies and help battle dandruff. I work in a school where I’m prone/exposed to getting head lice and the tea tree oil has always helped keep my hair/head clean.
customer_reviews.author: RosyM

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I am an avid user of Tea Tree oil in general. I use it for many things. Since I have bad allergies I use it in my netti solution to clean my nostrils; this is also great for sinus infections. It's even great on sores or rashes as an antiseptic. (I'm not a doctor so use that information as you will. You should know when to seek professional help.) This particular brand seems to be a little more mellow than most other ones I have tried. However, it is still just as affective.
customer_reviews.author: Charles C. E. Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Horrid smell
customer_reviews.text: It's been working great on my dandruff but the smell is horrendous.. not even my shampoo and conditioner can get rid of the smell which really sucks because I like that it leave my hair healthier but I don't think the earthly death smell is worth it. I wish it was more minty.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: A Good Deal
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps not the most concentrated, but not diluted. Does the job for me.
customer_reviews.author: calebism

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this stuff, will buy again when I'm out. Came as described, would recommend. Good for dandruff (mix with shampoo) or for minor cuts and scrapes. I randomly decided to use it on a ~2 year old raised-up scar (dog bite puncture) that scar has faded drastically and is smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This one seems like it was made by "Oils"
customer_reviews.text: I must say that I have been using tea tree essential oil for a while and purchased from various companies. This one seems like it was made by "Oils", which is same brand I have been using, howeve, the smell os not the same and I do not like it AT ALL. Not aure what went wrong but I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: offir sharabi

customer_reviews.title: Better thanks the leading brands that are x2 more expensive
customer_reviews.text: The tea tree oil is one of my favorite essential oils, I have been looking at and using a lot of brands of tea tree oils like one of the leading brands doterra which is about 2x more expensive and it’s only 8oz, I’ve tried it and I don’t smell or feel a difference. So I ended up using thins and not using the more expensive one I feel great. I would highly recommended buying this
customer_reviews.author: 123abc

customer_reviews.title: how to dispense?
customer_reviews.text: I love tea tree oil. This is a good brand, but the glass dropper in the box was broke int 2 pieces. I will not return it, it is easier just to use it and figure out a way to dispense it.
customer_reviews.author: amadama

customer_reviews.title: Smells Awful!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using tea tree oil products from the body shop for a while now and I tend to run out of the oil itself so I ordered this as a bulk size. It smells so awful, like an ashtray. I can’t even mask it, I tried to mix it and it still smells horrendous!
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Take heed and listen
customer_reviews.text: I use Teatree oil every time after I shower, this is the foulest smelling tea tree oil I have ever smelt. Returned without hassle, get ready to call Amazon for your refund if you end up purchasing. I should have listened to all the other reviews
customer_reviews.author: Jhon Mikenzy

customer_reviews.title: Not tea tree oil!! Don't fall for this.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using tea tree oil for years, and this smells nothing like tea tree oil. It's going in the garbage, because I do not trust this product. It stinks like Pine Sol, and bears no resemblance to tea tree oil whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: ace

product_meta.title: ArtNaturals Tea Tree Essential Oil 4oz - 100% Pure Oils Premium Melaleuca Therapeutic Grade Best for Acne, Skin, Hair, Nail Fungus, Face and Body Wash Aromatherapy & Diffuser
feature_bullets: 100% PURE : ArtNaturals Tea Tree Essential Oil is 100% Pure, unadulterated, therapeutic grade, and GC/MS tested.Undiluted. No additives. Analysis reports are available in the images and on our website. Vegan and cruelty free.

PURIFY, CLEANSE & WELLNESS- Supports clear skin, sharp thinking and motivation. Steam-distilled from Melaleuca alterfornia tree leaves, the fresh herbaceous clean scent of Tea Tree Essential oil is great to diffuse during cold & flu season. Can be used in a variety of anti-acne skin care applications.

AROMATIC- Can be used with an essential oil diffuser to provide therapeutic aromatic benefits or simply perfume your space. Replace toxic synthetic air fresheners and plug-ins with the aromas of pure botanical extracts.

CAN BE APPLIED TOPICALLY- Safe for skin when properly diluted with a carrier oil or your favorite bath & body products. Great to use for DIY beauty recipes and therapeutic massage oils. Remember to test for sensitivities and allergies before using any new product.

SATISFACTION GUARANTEED - ArtNaturals offers a 100% satisfaction guaranteed or your money back. Try it risk free with no questions asked and top customer service. You have nothing to lose and your health to gain.
